title: School Detail banner: single-row 4-tile strip + “See photos {count}” control

requirements.summary: Update School Detail banner to render a single-row, 4-tile photo strip (no 2x2 collage) while preserving existing gradient + title/location overlays.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop/wide layouts, the banner shows 4 images in a single horizontal row (not a 2x2 grid).
Images use `object-cover` and do not appear stretched; each tile maintains a consistent aspect ratio.
If only 1 image is available, the banner renders a single full-width image tile gracefully (no empty tiles).
The existing dark gradient readability overlay, school name, and location remain present and readable over the images.
All user-facing and accessibility text introduced/changed remains in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the current 2x2 grid banner layout with a single horizontal row layout that displays up to 4 visible tiles per page (flex/grid columns), ensuring each tile uses object-cover and consistent height; handle 1-image case as a single full-width tile; keep the existing gradient overlay plus school name/location overlay readable and positioned consistently.

requirements.summary: Adjust School Detail banner controls to keep left/right arrows and show a compact “See photos {remainingCount}” control on the last visible tile when additional photos exist.
acceptanceCriteria: When more than 4 banner images exist, left/right navigation arrows are available and usable (mouse + keyboard) with English `aria-label`s (e.g., “Previous photos”, “Next photos”).
When more than 4 images exist, the 4th tile displays a compact overlay control that communicates the remaining count in the format “See photos {remainingCount}” (English).
The “See photos {remainingCount}” overlay does not block the school name/location overlay readability (no overlapping that makes the title/location hard to read).
The banner layout remains stable (no layout shift) when navigating pages.
No changes are made to Directory listing SchoolCards; this change applies only to the School Detail banner.

file_operations.description: Update pagination UI/behavior: keep previous/next arrow buttons with English aria-labels and keyboard support; replace the existing centered/full-tile remaining-count overlay with a compact “See photos {remainingCount}” control rendered on the last visible tile when more photos exist (e.g., positioned away from the bottom-left title/location overlay to avoid readability overlap); ensure page navigation does not change banner dimensions or tile sizing to prevent layout shift.
